title: Privacy and robustness in Lightning
summary: Rusty drops by to tell us about why privacy and robustness should be prioritized in Lightning.
description:
Rusty drops by to tell us about why privacy and robustness should be prioritized in Lightning.

  • What broke when fee rate spiked? (31:21)
